mapper.select: SELECT b.bname , b.bno , b.phone , b.address , COUNT(c.content) AS content , c.rdate , AVG(c.grade) AS grade FROM business b JOIN comments c ON b.bno = c.bno WHERE b.address LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyaddr},'%');
SELECT no , name , week , time FROM laundrytime WHERE time NOT LIKE'%00:00~00:00%' AND no = #{bno};
SELECT bno , lno , name , product , price FROM laundryinfo WHERE bno = #{bno};
SELECT content , mname , DATE(rdate) AS rdate , grade FROM infor_review WHERE bno = #{bno} ORDER BY rdate DESC;
